text.text_translated: Scientists are asking how genes help our brain and language to grow. Did a gene change a long time ago? Did this change give us language? Scientists found a gene that changed. This happened between 200,000 and 100,000 years ago. This gene has a link with speaking. It helps our brain move our mouth and face. Monkeys have a similar gene. But in monkeys, this gene did not change. It is too early to say how much genes affect language. But maybe one day we will find the answers in our DNA.
